§ 4104. Availability of facilities and appropriations The services and facilities of and appropriations for the Coast Guard shall be available to effectuate the purposes of the Reserve and the Auxiliary. (Aug. 4, 1949, ch. 393, 63 Stat. 557, § 894; renumbered § 4104, Pub. L. 115–282, title I, § 120(b), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4237.)
Historical and Revision NotesBased on title 14, U.S.C., 1946 ed., § 354 (Feb. 19, 1941, ch. 8, title III, § 304, 55 Stat. 14). Changes were made in phraseology. 81st Congress, House Report No. 557.
Editorial Notes Amendments2018—Pub. L. 115–282 renumbered section 894 of this title as this section.
